title: Houses have history
creator_credit: Paul Fillinger, George McQuilkin and Churchill Films
brief_description: Children look at old buildings and their features in and around San Francisco/Sacramento, USA. Examines how a neighbourhood has changed and the growing interest in preserving and renovating old buildings. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Paul Fillinger, George McQuilkin and Churchill Films
